de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Class CommonCardTerminal

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card.CommonCardTerminal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICardTerminal, de.intarsys.tools.attribute.IAttributeSupport, de.intarsys.tools.event.INotificationSupport
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardCardTerminal

    public abstract class CommonCardTerminal
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICardTerminal
    Abstract superclass for implementing ICardTerminal

    To provide asynchronous communication with cards, the card terminal may delegate tasks to an executor. Typical examples are connection creation or transaction setup, as these may be pending dependent on some external system state.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card.ICardTerminal
